description: This hook is used to manage the selected state and keyboard navigation of listbox component.

props.description: Auto select (not compatible with multi-select listbox)
props.name: autoSelect

returnType.description: Function that returns true if index is selected
returnType.name: isIndexSelected

returnType.description: Get tab index for tab key navigation
returnType.name: getTabIndex

returnType.description: Function that handles on key down for navigation
returnType.name: onKeyNavigation

returnType.description: Ref object to use if ref isn't supplied in props
returnType.name: ref

returnType.description: Function that toggles selected state of listbox
returnType.name: toggleIndexSelected
